column3: School of Health and Psychological Sciences
column5: Key informationCombine the latest research and theoretical knowledge with practical learning and clinical skills on this master’s programme for practising optometrists. Our MSc enjoys an excellent reputation and you will learn with expert practitioners and researchers who are leaders in the field of eye disease and ocular therapeutics.Course overviewCombine the latest research and theoretical knowledge with practical learning and clinical skills on this master’s programme for practising optometrists. Our MSc enjoys an excellent reputation and you will learn with expert practitioners and researchers who are leaders in the field of eye disease and ocular therapeutics.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time (plus up to 1 year for dissertation), 2 years part time (plus up to 1 year for dissertation)
